description: Textiles are everywhere, from the apparel you wear to the furniture in your home—this 4-module course will help you understand it from fiber to finishing. The lessons of this course will include: Fibers, Yarns, Woven or Knitted Fabrics, Dyes, Prints and Finishes. Fast-paced and relying heavily on high-quality photographs of real garments, you can immediately apply this knowledge to your daily life or to your work in the fashion industry.
title: Textile Fundamentals
